title: Cold War | Dates, Definition, Timeline , Summary, Era, & Facts
snippet: Cold War , the open yet restricted rivalry that developed after World War II between the United States and the Soviet Union and their respective allies. It was waged on political, economic, and propaganda fronts and had only limited recourse to weapons.

title: The Space Race: Timeline , Cold War & Facts
snippet: U.S. History . All the major chapters in the American story , from Indigenous beginnings to the present day.Known as the Cold War , this battle pitted the world’s two great powers—the democratic, capitalist United States and the communist Soviet Union—against each other.
